thread.title: Hainan Airlines Launches Beijing-Prague Route
thread.title_full: Hainan Airlines Launches Beijing-Prague Route - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hainan Airlines Launches Beijing-Prague Route
text:
Hainan Airlines Co., LTD
PRAGUE , Sept. 24, Hainan Airlines flight HU7937 landed at Vaclav Havel Airport Prague at 7:10 am on September 23 rd local time, marking the successful inaugural flight of the carrier's Beijing - Prague route, the first nonstop service between China and the Czech Republic .
After the aircraft arrived at the gate, Hainan Airlines held a brief welcoming ceremony at Vaclav Havel Airport Prague, with guests including Czech Prime Minister Bohuslav Sobotka and Chinese Ambassador to the Czech Republic Ma Keqing in attendance.
On the evening of the same day, Hainan Airlines hosted a gala dinner in Prague to celebrate the success of the inaugural flight. In addition to the Chinese ambassador, CzechTourism CEO Monika Palatkova and representatives from CzechTrade, CzechInvest, the Czech-Chinese Chamber of Commerce, local Chinese-invested companies and the Czech Republic's overseas Chinese community were present at the dinner.
Congratulating Hainan Airlines on the success of the inaugural flight, Ma Keqing said that bilateral relations between China and the Czech Republic are moving ahead steadily in every aspect, and that the opening of the direct route will play an important role in strengthening interpersonal communications and cooperation between the two countries, while creating an opportunity for the two countries to make further progress on their major partnerships.
Hainan Airlines president Xie Haoming said, "The Beijing - Prague route is the first nonstop service between China and the Czech Republic . We hope the air bridge, which serves as a platform for Sino-Czech friendship, can provide safe, convenient and comfortable air travel services to tourists from both countries. With the implementation of China's One Belt , One Road strategy, cooperation between Chinese and European aviation markets will further expand, creating many opportunities for business travel and outbound tourism between China and European countries. The Beijing - Prague route will provide more convenience for governmental and non-governmental exchanges between the two countries."
The Beijing - Prague route is Hainan Airlines' seventh European route following Beijing - Brussels , Beijing - Berlin , Beijing - Moscow , Beijing - St. Petersburg , Hangzhou - Xi'an - Paris and Chongqing - Rome . The launch of the Beijing - Prague route will further improve Hainan Airlines' global network.

About Hainan Airlines:
Hainan Airlines Co., Ltd., founded in January 1993 , is one of the world's seven SKYTRAX five-star airlines. Hainan Airlines has a young luxury fleet mainly composed of Boeing 737s, 787s and Airbus 330s. The airline has, to date, opened over 600 inbound and outbound routes connecting passengers to more than 90 cities around the world, with comprehensive coverage across China and extending into Asia , Europe and North America . For more information, please visit Hainan Airlines' global official website www.hainanairlines.com .
